last_episode_to_air.name: Addicted to Hacks
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kevin and Brooke have dinner in a hot tub; Kevin re-hacks a self-tanner; teens let the hacks take over.

name: Hack My Life
overview: Taking everyday items and using them to make your life easier.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Taking everyday items and using them to make your life easier.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Taking everyday items and using them to make your life easier.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Taking everyday items and using them to make your life easier.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Taking everyday items and using them to make your life easier.

episodes.name: The World of Hacks
episodes.overview: Brooke and Kevin put their hacking skills to the test as they find out which hacks work best for removing pet hair, grilling without charcoal, and opening a wine bottle without a bottle opener. Plus, they'll uncover the best pool party hacks, and craft a hack-filled defense against the rugged outdoorsman.

episodes.name: Slacker vs. Hacker
episodes.overview: Brooke and Kevin determine which hacks work best for combatting spicy foods, peeling potatoes, camping, and keeping the mirror from fogging up after a shower. Plus, they'll see if a fork made from a pencil really does the trick.

episodes.name: An Explosion of Hacks
episodes.overview: Brooke and Kevin find out which hacks work best for shining shoes, avoiding soda can explosions, putting wine in a blender, and housekeeping. Plus, they'll teach you hacks that will help combat any party animal.

episodes.name: Peeling Back the Hacks
episodes.overview: Brooke and Kevin compete to discover the best hacks for chopping a watermelon, removing stickers from a locker. Plus, they'll prepare you for your next tailgate and for any encounter with a walking disaster.

episodes.name: Undercover Hacks
episodes.overview: Brooke and Kevin go undercover as they find out which hacks work best for opening a beer bottle. Plus, they discover new hacks for cleaning, throwing a great party, and using a ballpoint pen in ways you'd never imagine.

episodes.name: Hack the Unexpected
episodes.overview: Brooke and Kevin put their hacking skills to the test as they find out which hacks work best for popping popcorn and polishing silverware. Plus, they'll uncover the best hacks for working out and using dental floss.

episodes.name: Cookin' Up Some Hacks
episodes.overview: Brooke and Kevin take hacking to the next level as they uncover the best hacks for cooking pizza and cutting cake. Plus, they'll show why bread is a true All-Star, and teach you some hacks that every parent needs to know.

episodes.name: Lost and Found Hacks
episodes.overview: Our hosts find hacks for retrieving lost objects, separating egg yolks, and removing wallpaper stains. They'll also make duct tape an All-Star, find another use for walnuts, and show you how to hack your home while you're away.

episodes.name: Swimming in Hacks
episodes.overview: Brooke and Kevin swim in the back of a truck, cook steak in a bag, and turn bike parts into a clock. Plus, they add coffee filters to the All-Star club, uncover road trip tips, and craft hacks to defend against your sick spouse.

episodes.name: Hack or Wack
episodes.overview: Brooke and Kevin uncover the difference between a hack and a wack, as they use an onion for cleaning and beer for moisturizer. Plus, they show you the real way to hack your hotel breakfast, and how to defend against your needy neighbor.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Taking everyday items and using them to make your life easier.

episodes.name: Dr. Hack to the Rescue
episodes.overview: Brooke and Kevin find out if an electrocuted hot dog is hack or wack, welcome socks to the all-star club, and learn how a bra is really a hack from history. And there's a new doctor in town with his own hacks to save the day.

episodes.name: Lend Me a Hack
episodes.overview: Our dynamic duo discovers how to hack vodka to taste like top shelf, explores the origin of gin and tonic with Hacks from History, and welcomes a tennis ball into the exclusive All Star club.

episodes.name: Battle of the Bags
episodes.overview: Kevin and Brooke host the ultimate Battle of the Bags by discovering the best hacks for carrying groceries. Plus, they welcome rubber gloves to the All Star Club and explore hacks from the original Hack Master: Benjamin Franklin.

episodes.name: Hacking the Brain
episodes.overview: Kevin and Brooke search for the ultimate lipstick hack, explore beeswax as a waterproofing technique, and welcome an old tire into the All-Star Club. Plus, this week's "Hack Master" will go to the extreme by hacking Kevin's brain.

episodes.name: Beard-Off
episodes.overview: Kevin and Brooke put the best shaving hacks to the test in the ultimate beard-off, and find out if using a drill to eat corn is hack or wack. Plus, they'll welcome toothpaste into the All-Star Club and use pencil lead to make a light bulb.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Taking everyday items and using them to make your life easier.

episodes.name: Hacky Holidays
episodes.overview: Gather 'round the screen for a most hackful holiday celebration, as Brooke and Kevin bring good tidings and great hacks to liven up the season. Plus, a look deep into history to find out how the ball drop became a New Year's tradition.

episodes.name: Good Guys Finish First
episodes.overview: Kevin and Brooke hack their way through the worst obstacles an airport has to offer and viewers share their DIY solutions for whipping up cream. Plus, Brooke and Kevin find out how low prices can go if you're a "good guy."

episodes.name: Pool Party Of One
episodes.overview: Skip a trip to the spa with a facial hack you can find in any schoolkid's book bag and learn how to treat yourself like it's your birthday, any day of the year. Plus, Brooke and Kevin go for a swim, in a garbage bag.

episodes.name: Hacks To Set The Mood
episodes.overview: Señor Solución discovers a hack that gets him back in the mood, and Kevin and Brooke reveal fan hacks for cooling down a hot bed. Plus, get revenge on rigged arcades with hacks to make the claw machine cough up a sweet prize.

episodes.name: No Reservation Required
episodes.overview: Officers Mack and Jack crash a failed football-viewing party, Kevin and Brooke use an important hacker's tool to secure a restaurant reservation, and it's mom versus dad in a race to determine peanut butter & jelly supremacy.

episodes.name: Fill Er Up
episodes.overview: Brooke and Kevin demonstrate how to save money at the gas tank, and the Lazy Cook shows us a great way to get more bacon out of our BLTs. Plus, breaking up doesn't have to be so hard when you use these lessons from our Hack Hero!

episodes.name: Jump The Line
episodes.overview: Brooke and Kevin give tips on skipping a busy lunch line with a new Gaming the System hack, the Pitchman has some money-saving advice for your car, and ever wonder where high heels come from? Find out in Hacks From History.

episodes.name: Hack To The Future
episodes.overview: We're going to the future with Kevin as he lives out his hoverboard dream with Master Hacker Science Bob. And move over, 2000 thread count sheets, Brooke and Kevin spot a hack that will help your sheets feel like a million bucks!

episodes.name: Hack-a-bye Baby
episodes.overview: Officers Mack and Jack come to the rescue of a perp who has a tough time being alone, and Kevin reunites with his long-time friend Candace Bailey in a hacksperiment where they attempt to find out the sex of her baby.

episodes.name: To Tell A Lie
episodes.overview: Brooke and Kevin meet their toughest challenge yet when they use hacks to game a polygraph test, and it gets hot and heavy in the OR when Dr. Hack meets the fiery new CEO. Plus, Kevin learns how to defend himself with a smartphone.

episodes.name: Awww Craps!
episodes.overview: Brooke and Kevin meet their toughest challenge yet when they use hacks to game a polygraph test, and it gets hot and heavy in the OR when Dr. Hack meets the fiery new CEO. Plus, Kevin learns how to defend himself with a smartphone.

episodes.name: Light Up Your Life
episodes.overview: Brooke and Kevin explore hacks that could save money on your cable bill, and Hack Master Kosta Grammatis helps Kevin fulfill his childhood laser-blast dreams. Plus, find out how a hack helped get the world into a sticky situation.

episodes.name: Addicted To Hacks
episodes.overview: Kevin and Brooke are having dinner in a hot tub… yup, it's exactly what you think. And it's a blast from the past as Kevin re-hacks a self-tanner. Plus, in the new Saved by the Hacks, our teens have let the hacks take over.

episodes.name: Hack And Cheese
episodes.overview: Brooke and Kevin learn ways to game the system with parking, and the Lazy Cook returns with a recipe for bringing old mac and cheese back to life. Plus, Senora is not the portrait of good behavior in a new Hacks Del Corazon.

episodes.name: Co-Hackitation
episodes.overview: Brooke meets a dominatrix who wants to teach a pomegranate a lesson, and Mack and Jack try to help a new couple beat the cohabitation curse. Plus, Kevin and Brooke test a hack that puts your baby to work.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Taking everyday items and using them to make your life easier.

episodes.name: Addicted to Hacks
episodes.overview: Kevin and Brooke have dinner in a hot tub; Kevin re-hacks a self-tanner; teens let the hacks take over.

4.name: Season 4
